concept.title: 16-2. Authority to use the GPC for Non-Standard Ammunition (NSA) not from Army inventory

conbody.p: Per AR 5-13 paragraph 2-1.b. and 2-7.a.(4), ASA(ALT), through the ODASA(P) and JPEO A&A, have implemented a waiver process (Figure 15-1) to procure small quantities of Non-Standard Ammunition (NSA) for Armyâ€™s requirements that are not NSA from Army inventory.
